data.actual_result: The icon completely blends into the white background
data.short_description: Other Reactions button's smiley icon isn't visible on White Theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your client theme to White Theme - Go into a server you have permission to react to messages in - Right-click on a message and hover over the Add Reaction option - Scroll down to the bottom of the menu and observe where the Other Reactions button's smiley icon should be
